Class DataProvider

java.lang.Object
DataProvider
public class DataProvider extends Object
Repository of member and bill information, handling the loading and saving of data to and from csv files

  • Constructor Details

    • DataProvider

      public DataProvider(String memberFile, String billFile) throws DataAccessException, DataFormatException
      Parameters:
      memberFile - A path to the member file (e.g., members.csv)
      billFile - A path to the bill file (e.g., bills.csv)
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - If a file cannot be opened/read
      DataFormatException - If the format of the the content is incorrect

      Returns:

      public boolean isValidMember(String memberId)
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member ID to look up
      Returns:
      True if memberId matches a Member

    • getMemberName

      public String getMemberName(String memberId)
      Parameters:
      memberId - search for this member id
      Returns:
      the member name, or a 0 length string if not found

      public String getSummary()
      Returns:
